title: Slideomatic Field Guide
subtitle: Use these slides to poke every control in real time

headline: This deck is the manual
body: Arrow keys move, `?` opens the cheat sheet. Hit it once now so you know what’s there.
Every slide is a prompt—read it, try it. Nothing saves to a server; all edits live in your browser until you export JSON or PDF.

headline: Press **E** and keep it open
body: Content tab = titles, body arrays, badges, quotes, captions. Type something, click out, it auto-saves.
Layouts tab lets you swap this slide into quote/gallery/pillars or add a new slide already styled.
Media tab handles uploads, compression, captions. Right rail also hides SomaFM and the **Download PDF** button.

headline: Change this slide
body: Duplicate it, flip the layout, or rewrite the headline. Undo isn’t here yet, so dupes are your safety net.
Reorder by dragging the slide chip in the left rail. Slide numbers update automatically.
Delete = Cmd/Ctrl + Backspace inside the drawer if you hate clicking.

headline: Keep the rhythm weird
body: Standard, quote, gallery, pillars, typeface, image—all one click away. Swap a couple.

headline: Fonts are mood swings
body: Override the `font` field when you need a new voice mid-story.

caption: Leave `image.src` empty and keep the `alt` text to unlock the Google Images button while presenting.

headline: Press **T** whenever the vibe feels stale
body: Theme drawer lets you randomize palettes, tweak layer styles, and save presets. Everything updates live.
The SomaFM toggle pipes Deep Space Disco straight into the drawer so you can design with a soundtrack.
Got a Gemini API key? Drop it in, hit the wand, and let it remix palettes/fonts off your prompts.

headline: Keep these in your fingers
body: `Cmd/Ctrl + Enter` jumps into presenter mode, `Esc` bounces back to edit.
`Shift + Arrow` skips five slides, `Option/Alt + Arrow` duplicates without touching the drawer.
`Cmd/Ctrl + L` focuses the location bar so you can copy the deck URL with its current query params.
Word on the street says some old-school cheat codes unlock extra superpowers. If you know you know.

pillars.title: JSON
pillars.text: `D` downloads the current deck. `U` uploads one. Keep a `_schema` slide at the top if you want inline docs.

pillars.title: PDF
pillars.text: Hit **Download PDF** in the drawer to trigger the exporter (writes into `/exports`).

pillars.title: Local stash
pillars.text: Deck autosaves live in `localStorage` under `slideomatic_deck_overrides:*`. Clear them if you need a clean slate.

pillars.title: Voice
pillars.text: Tap the mic icon in the HUD to narrate slides hands-free.

quote: Ship the weird draft. Future you can clean it up.

headline: If something feels off
body: Hard refresh (`Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + R`) nukes cached JSON + themes.
If the drawer yells about missing fields, it’s telling the truth. Fix it there and the slide unblocks.
Still stuck? Open devtools, inspect the `slideomatic` keys, copy the JSON, and DM it to Pablo.

headline: Treat Slideomatic like a sketchbook
body: Duplicate this deck, tear it apart, swap in your own chaos. It’s yours.
When you land something you love, log it in `~/.codex/codex_diary.md` so future you remembers how it felt.
Have fun, keep it human, keep it moving.
